name: Pseudo Life
description:
Welcome to Pseudo Life!

In our world, parents work hard for their children's happiness. And, as a high school student, your life is in your hand. Either studying hard or dating with girls are all your choice.

Instruction:

[Tab]  to see ability panel.

[F] to interact with bed or NPC

[Esc] Setting Menu

[↑←↓→]  or [ASWD] Movement

Following link is the tutorial of Pseudo Life

Note: The save and load mode may not work because of the web version.
